key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
ai_description: The product features vibrant pink dumbbells with a matte vinyl coating, displaying the KAKSS brand and weight (0.5 KG) in white print. The dumbbells have a hexagonal shape to prevent rolling and ensure stable storage. Promotional images show color-coded sets in red, blue, and green (1KG, 3KG, 5KG) with a cast-iron core. The packaging is white with color accents, highlighting features like the non-slip coating and professional grade construction.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts and home gym users
